member.response: Registration successful. Returns json with progress
The user already exists, received data is null, passwords don't match, other error (watch Logs). Returns message about error

member.response: Login succwssful. Returns json with jwt tokens and userName
The user already exists, received data is null, passwords don't match, other error (watch Logs). Returns message about error

member.name: M:MS_Back_Auth.Controllers.AuthController.RefreshTokenGet
member.response: Token change successful. Returns json with jwt tokens and userName
User ID (from token) conversion in int failed, other error (watch Logs). Returns message about error
Invalid or missing token. Returns message about error
The user wasn't found. Returns message about error

member.name: M:MS_Back_Auth.Controllers.AuthController.PasswordCheck(MS_Back_Auth.PasswordClass)
member.response: Password correct. Returns message about completion
User ID (from token) conversion in int failed, received data is null, other error (watch Logs). Returns message about error
Invalid or missing token, the password doesn't match. Returns message about error
The user wasn't found. Returns message about error

member.name: M:MS_Back_Auth.Controllers.AuthController.UserIdCheck(MS_Back_Auth.UserIdCheckModel)
member.remarks: If user exists, it sends confirmation and his username. If user doesn't exists or recieved data is wrong, it sends denial
